sentences.en: "I just added a little soy sauce," he informs us.
sentences.cn: “我就加了一点儿酱油，”他告诉我们。

sentences.en: Add some sugar to the soy milk. They taste good together.
sentences.cn: 往豆浆里加些糖, 它们搭配起来吃味道好.

sentences.en: Brush soy sauce over the legs and coat with flour.
sentences.cn: 略放凉后,在鸡髀上抹一层豉油,并拍上一层面粉.

sentences.en: Buy: Citric acid, Soy sauce , Beans, Sunflower seeds, Food additive.
sentences.cn: 采购: 柠檬酸, 酱油,大豆, 瓜子, 食物添加剂.

sentences.en: Do we need some soy sauce and vinegar?
sentences.cn: 我们要酱油和醋 吗 ?

sentences.en: I recommend either whey or soy protein shakes.
sentences.cn: 我推荐乳清或者大豆蛋白奶昔。

sentences.en: If you like, you can serve the dish plain, without the soy or oyster sauce.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢的话，你可以把这道做得简单点，没有加酱油或蚝油。

sentences.en: Ingredient: Tomator, Eggs, Garlic, Green Onion, Salt and Soy Sauce.
sentences.cn: 用料: 西红柿, 鸡蛋, 蒜, 葱, 盐和酱油.

sentences.en: Much of the corn and soy is fed to animals .
sentences.cn: 大部分的玉米及大豆被用来喂养动物。

sentences.en: Put a bit more soy sauce in the food [ dish ].
So you're a soy - burger - making , vegetarian delivery boy, hmm?
sentences.cn: 这么说就是做做素菜汉堡然后送送外卖喽?

sentences.en: Soy bean oil and its products normally contains only 7 to 11 % palmitic acid.
sentences.cn: 豆油及豆油制品在正常情况下只含7-11%的软脂酸.

sentences.en: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 大豆食品像豆腐、豆豉和强化豆奶在这方面有双重功能，因为它们可同时提供钙和蛋白。

sentences.en: The gel rheological property of soy protein hydrolysates was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了大豆蛋白水解物的凝胶流变学特性.

sentences.en: The old man was thrashing the soy - bean crop.
The worldwide interest in soy beans is reason enough for the immediate publication of this book.
sentences.cn: 世界范围内对大豆的重视是本书尽快出版的充分理由.

sentences.en: What do you know about sesame oil added to soy sauce!
sentences.cn: 你懂得什么酱油上浇麻油!

sentences.en: Your neighbor is loud and dark and eats too much soy sauce.
sentences.cn: 你的邻居又黑又吵,还吃那么多酱油.

phrases.tran_cn: 大豆浓缩蛋白；[医]浓缩大豆蛋白

trans.tran_en: the plant on which soya beans grow; the food obtained from soya beans
